eu_initiatives: The Single European Sky initiative and related institutions like SESAR JU and SDM
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
“To be the leading Air Navigation Service Provider Alliance that enables its Members to drive better performance for stakeholders through business collaboration.” 
 
The Alliance have two objectives: 
 
1.    Primary objective: to facilitate cooperation between the Members, on commercially- recognised business partnering principles, that will make a contribution to the operational and financial performance of Members’ air traffic services, including by 2015 making a contribution to the achievement of Single European Sky and ICAO performance targets. 
 
2.    Secondary objective: to enable Members collectively to be more influential with relevant trade, regulatory and policy bodies in Europe and internationally by developing a common position on major issues and expressing it jointly.
